mapper.insert: insert into international_cvs_file_path(id, customer_id, create_date, international_id, active_file_path, active_file_size, active_number, no_register_file_path, no_register_file_size, no_register_number, unknown_number,unknown_file_path,unknown_file_size, zip_name, zip_path, zip_size, total_number, create_time,deleted,update_time) values (#{id},#{customerId},#{createDate},#{internationalId},#{activeFilePath},#{activeFileSize},#{activeNumber},#{noRegisterFilePath}, #{noRegisterFileSize},#{noRegisterNumber},#{unknownNumber},#{unknownFilePath},#{unknownFileSize},#{zipName},#{zipPath},#{zipSize},#{totalNumber},now(),0,now())
mapper.select: select id, customer_id, create_date, international_id, active_file_path, active_file_size, active_number, no_register_file_path, no_register_file_size, no_register_number, unknown_number,unknown_file_path,unknown_file_size, zip_name, zip_path, zip_size, total_number, create_time,deleted,update_time from international_cvs_file_path where customer_id = #{customerId} and international_id = #{internationalId} limit 0,1

SELECT id,customer_id,active_number,no_register_number,unknown_number,total_number,deleted, create_time,update_time,active_file_path,no_register_file_path,unknown_file_path,zip_name,zip_path,zip_size from international_cvs_file_path where customer_id = #{customerId} and deleted = 0 order by id desc limit 0,1

select sum(active_number) active_number, sum(no_register_number) no_register_number, sum(unknown_number) unknown_number, sum(total_number) totalNumber, create_date `day` from international_cvs_file_path where deleted = 0 and customer_id = #{customerId} and create_date >= #{fromTime} and create_date < #{endTime} group by create_date order by create_date
